nodes.text: Alus was a male Human citizen of the Eternal Empire of Zakuul living during the war against Zakuul. By the time Empress Vaylin took the Eternal Throne, Alus was an initiate training to join the ranks of the Knights of Zakuul. During the Grand Festival of Empress Vaylin in 3630 BBY he was present in the Palace of the Eternal Dragon barracks along with several Knights when Captain Frem told the story of Watcher Izax. Vaylin's speech was interrupted by the arrival of first Alliance Commander and then former Emperor Arcann. In an effort to kill them both, Vaylin ordered the Eternal Fleet to bomb the Palace into rubble, regardless of her supporters still inside.
Initiate Alus appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne during "Chapter VI: The Dragon's Maw."
